name: Grouse Grind
description: A steep and challenging trail often called 'Mother Nature's Stairmaster', popular for fitness enthusiasts.

name: St Marks Summit
description: A rewarding hike with stunning views of Howe Sound and the surrounding mountains.

name: Dog Mountain
description: An easy trail with a panoramic view of Vancouver from the top.

name: Lynn Loop
description: A peaceful forest loop following the banks of Lynn Creek.

name: Quarry Rock
description: A short hike to a popular viewpoint over Indian Arm and Deep Cove.

name: Capilano Pacific
location: West Vancouver to Capilano Dam, BC
description: A scenic riverside trail that ends at the historic Capilano Dam.

name: Norvan Falls
description: A long forested trail ending at a beautiful waterfall, suitable for all levels.

name: Eagle Bluffs
description: A moderately difficult hike offering panoramic views of Vancouver and Howe Sound.

name: Velodrome Trail
description: A short but steep trail up Burnaby Mountain, also known as Burnaby's Grouse Grind.

name: Pacific Spirit Loop
description: A flat loop trail through peaceful coastal rainforest near UBC.
